room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Chicago
review: The entire family (including two boys ages 12 and 14) had a great time and can't wait to return!  We experienced nothing but a high-quality experience including staff, orientation, props/clues, and level of difficulty.  We successfully completed the Sorcerer mission and are looking forward to the challenge of the additional rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Chicago
review: Ton of fun! We had a group of 8 friends with 2 strangers and still had a blast. 'Sorcerer's Secret' was a great room to try for beginners.

room_title: Escape room "Sorcerer's Secret" by Mastermind Escape Games in Chicago
review: Have been to a couple escape rooms and this was so much fun! We did the Sorcerer's Secret and I definitely recommend to do this with more than 2 people! It was just me and my husband and was a bit too challenging for just the 2 of us, but would have been great with 4 - 6 more people. We still had a great time and would definitely do it again.
